title: I'm scared because I keep seeing a ton of hypothetical situations about how the world will destroy itself or how it will just suddenly end. What can I do about this? - Quora

response.answer_text: The next time something bugs you, worries you, or in this case scares you - conduct this simple test: Can you do anything about it?Yes. Great, do something about it.No. Forget about it. You can’t change it so go wash your car or make a sandwich. Worrying about it is something you do have control over. Control it by not worrying about.Continue what you are already doing and stay scared and miserable.What result do you want? You generally can’t control much of what goes on around you but you CAN control how you react to it.

Get a grip. The sun will not get too hot for billions of years. Do you have the foggiest idea how long that is? A billion seconds will last until 2051. The things to be concerned about are problems we can solve, like loss of biodiversity and climate change. Use that worryin’ time to get informed, then vote.
